title: Apple protests secrecy violation at Day 2 of Google anti-trust trial
description: At issue was whether the Justice Department had revealed sensitive business information in violation of an agreement on confidentiality.

title: China denies iPhone ban for officials but notes its ‘security incidents’
description: The comments from China’s Foreign Ministry coincided with Apple’s release of its iPhone 15 models.

title: In a first, spyware is found on phone of prominent Russian journalist
description: Researchers say they confirmed that NSO Group’s Pegasus spyware was planted on the phone of Meduza owner Galina Timchenko.

title: Tech titans including Musk, Zuckerberg head to Capitol Hill to talk AI
description: X’s Elon Musk, Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg, Google’s Sundar Pichai and OpenAI’s Sam Altman are among tech leaders headed to Capitol Hill to discuss AI regulation.

title: Is a smartwatch right for you? Our quiz can help you decide.
description: Take this quiz from the Help Desk to find out whether a smartwatch could make your daily routine a little easier.
